summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 13, 2019, including a count sheet, an inmate roster, and count slips. It records inmate counts and assignments, notably listing Jeffrey Epstein (under his inmate registration number) in the hospital unit on the date of his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed by inmate registration number (18028-104) on the hospital unit roster for August 13, 2019, the date of his death.

persons.name: Leon-Maal
persons.context: Listed as an inmate (REG NO 0001) in the hospital unit on the inmate roster for August 13, 2019.

persons.name: Santana
persons.context: Listed as an inmate (REG NO 0002) in the hospital unit on the inmate roster for August 13, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Count and Roster
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates and recording of assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 13, 2019, the date Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed by his inmate registration number (18028-104) on an inmate roster for the hospital (HOSP) unit.
The records show standard prison administrative procedures, including out-counts and unit assignments, being carried out.
The forms originate from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was held.
